page.title: 08HERTSMERE BOROUGH COUNCIL
page.content: The{Council}is made up of 39 members who are elected for 4 years. The Mayor and Deputy Mayor are elected in May, and the committees and sub-committees are set. Representatives are also appointed to committees of other local organisations and statutory bodies, and as school governors. The Council works through{committees}meeting five times a year. The Policy and Resources Committee determines priorities and allocates resources. Administration is by the{Chief Executive}(responsible for Personnel and Environmental Health) and four{Chief Officers.}The Borough Secretary has responsibility for central administration, whilst finances are controlled by the Treasurer. Planning and Highways are overseen by the Technical Services Officer, while the Housing Officer is responsible for council properties.
